title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Tread gently with your words since you could be your most savage critic today. Its one thing to subject yourself to scrutiny and rigorous self-evaluation. But its a whole other ball of wax to be unkind to yourself and your capabilities. Prickly Mars in Virgo prods you toward making significant improvements with your life. But often the most longstanding changes are incremental and require many adjustments until you strike the right rhythm. Inventor Buckminster Fuller wrote, There is nothing in a caterpillar that tells you its going to be a butterfly. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
